name: Randomforest-docclassification
tagline: Implementation of horizontal and vertical partitioning, and bag-of-words model based document image classification.
body:
# RandomForest-DocClassification
My implementation of horizontal and vertical partitioning, bag-of-word model based document image classification.

The matlab version of this implementation was used in following work:

1. Jayant Kumar and David Doermann. "Unsupervised Classification of Structurally Similar Document Images." Intl. Conf. on Document Analysis and Recognition (ICDAR 13), pp. 1257-1261, August 2013.		
		
2. Jayant Kumar, Peng Ye and David Doermann. "Structural Similarity for Document Image Classification and Retrieval." Pattern Recognition Letters, pp. 119-126, November 2013.

3. Jayant Kumar, Peng Ye and David Doermann. "Learning Document Structure for Retrieval and Classification." International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2012), pp. 1558-1561, 2012.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
